description: This file defines a mock class 'Store2NotificationMock' used for testing, which implements the 'INotification' interface from 'WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2'. It includes a mock method 'ValueChanged' for simulating notification behavior in tests.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing the 'INotification' interface to facilitate testing of notification behaviors in the system.

methods.name: ~Store2NotificationMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate the behavior when a value changes; used in test scenarios.
